languages.text: "Не существует иных городов, элантах. Темный город бескраен — он есть сплетение множества кошмарных царств, подчиненных одному властителю. Бесконечное переплетение измерений, вечно меняющихся и вечно неизменных. Тебе не осознать его темного величия, ибо даже моей жизни не хватит, чтобы посетить все уголки Темного города и прилегающих к нему царств. Впрочем, куда бы ты ни пош{mf|ел|ла}, вокруг тебя ждет лишь смерть".

traits.locale_text: "Не существует иных городов, элантах. Темный Город бескраен — он есть сплетение множества кошмарных царст, подчиненых одному властителю. Бесконечное переплетение измерений, вечно меняющихся и вечно неизменных. Тебе не осознать его темного величия, ибо даже моей жизни не хватит, чтобы посетить все уголки Темного Города и прилегающих к нему царств. Впрочем, куда бы ты ни пош{mf|ел|ла}, вокруг тебя ждет лишь смерть".

languages.text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."
languages.original_text: "Не существует иных городов, элантах. Темный город бескраен — он есть сплетение множества кошмарных царств, подчиненных одному властителю. Бесконечное переплетение измерений, вечно меняющихся и вечно неизменных. Тебе не осознать его темного величия, ибо даже моей жизни не хватит, чтобы посетить все уголки Темного города и прилегающих к нему царств. Впрочем, куда бы ты ни пош{mf|ел|ла}, вокруг тебя ждет лишь смерть".

traits.locale_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the gloomy realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death is lurking on every corner."

languages.text: “没有别的城市了，外界人。黑暗之城无穷无尽，它是由无数噩梦世界纠缠在一起构成的产物，听命于唯一的统治者。这个混合体由无数不断变化与恒久不变的维度构成，你根本无法想象它究竟有多大。就算是我，也无法在寿命耗尽之前，造访黑暗之城的每个角落与所有接壤的世界。不过，你在哪里并不重要，因为这里的每个角落都潜伏着死亡。”
languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

traits.locale_text: “没有别的城市了，外界人。黑暗之城无穷无尽，它是由无数噩梦世界纠缠在一起构成的产物，听命于唯一的统治者。这个混合体由无数不断变化与恒久不变的维度构成，你根本无法想象它究竟有多大。就算是我，也无法在寿命耗尽之前，造访黑暗之城的每个角落与所有接壤的世界。不过，你在哪里并不重要，因为这里的每个角落都潜伏着死亡。”

languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

languages.text: «No hay más ciudades, elantach. La Ciudad Siniestra no tiene límites: es una combinación de incontables dominios de pesadilla bajo el control de un único gobernante. Una amalgama sin fin de dimensiones volubles e inmutables. No puedes comprender su tenebrosa grandeza, pues ni tan siquiera mi vida entera bastaría para visitar todos los rincones de la Ciudad Siniestra y los reinos que la rodean. Lo que no debes olvidar es que, vayas donde vayas, la muerte acecha en cada esquina».
languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

traits.locale_text: «No hay más ciudades, elantach. La Ciudad Siniestra no tiene límites: es una combinación de incontables dominios de pesadilla bajo el control de un único gobernante. Una amalgama sin fin de dimensiones volubles e inmutables. No puedes comprender su tenebrosa grandeza, pues ni tan siquiera mi vida entera bastaría para visitar todos los rincones de la Ciudad Siniestra y los reinos que la rodean. Lo que no debes olvidar es que, vayas donde vayas, la muerte acecha en cada esquina».

languages.text: 「エランタ、他の都市はない。仄暗き都には境界がなく、無数の悪夢の領域が絡み合い、単一の支配者に服従しているのだ。常に変化し、不変の次元が果てしない融合を繰り返している。仄暗き都とそれに隣接する領域の隅々を訪ねるには、私の人生でさえ時間が足りない。だが、どこに行くかはほとんど問題ではない。死はあらゆる角に潜んでいるのだから」
languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ、他の都市はない。仄暗き都には境界がなく、無数の悪夢の領域が絡み合い、単一の支配者に服従しているのだ。常に変化し、不変の次元が果てしない融合を繰り返している。仄暗き都とそれに隣接する領域の隅々を訪ねるには、私の人生でさえ時間が足りない。だが、どこに行くかはほとんど問題ではない。死はあらゆる角に潜んでいるのだから」

languages.text: "Es gibt keine anderen Städte, Elantach. Die Dunkle Stadt hat keine Grenzen, sie ist ein Gewirr aus unzähligen Albtraumreichen, die einem einzigen Herrscher unterstehen. Eine endlose Verschmelzung sich ständig verändernder und doch unveränderlicher Dimensionen. Ihr könnt ihre düstere Erhabenheit niemals begreifen, denn selbst mein Leben wäre nicht lang genug, um alle Ecken der Dunklen Stadt und der sie umgebenden Reiche zu besuchen. Es ist jedoch ohnehin gleichgültig, wohin man geht, denn der Tod lauert an jeder Ecke."
languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt keine anderen Städte, Elantach. Die Dunkle Stadt hat keine Grenzen, sie ist ein Gewirr aus unzähligen Albtraumreichen, die einem einzigen Herrscher unterstehen. Eine endlose Verschmelzung sich ständig verändernder und doch unveränderlicher Dimensionen. Ihr könnt ihre düstere Erhabenheit niemals begreifen, denn selbst mein Leben wäre nicht lang genug, um alle Ecken der Dunklen Stadt und der sie umgebenden Reiche zu besuchen. Es ist jedoch ohnehin gleichgültig, wohin man geht, denn der Tod lauert an jeder Ecke."

languages.text: « Il n'y a pas d'autres villes, elantach. La Cité Crépusculaire s'étend à l'infini, c'est un enchevêtrement d'innombrables domaines cauchemardesques sous la coupe d'un seul et même souverain. Un incommensurable amalgame de dimensions à la fois immuables et en constante évolution. Il vous est impossible d'appréhender sa ténébreuse grandeur, car même ma vie ne serait pas assez longue pour explorer tous ses recoins et ses royaumes vassaux. Mais tout ce que vous avez besoin de savoir, c'est que la mort rôde où que vous alliez. »
languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

languages.text: "Başka şehir yok elantach. Kara Şehir'in hududu yoktur. Tek bir hükümdara tabi olan, iç içe geçmiş nice kâbus diyarından oluşur. Sürekli değişen ve asla değişmeyen boyutların ebediyen bütünleşmiş hâlidir. Kasvetli ihtişamını tam anlamıyla kavraman mümkün değil. Benim ömrüm bile Kara Şehir'in dört bir yanını ve hudut komşusu diyarları ziyaret etmeye yetmeyecek. Yine de nereye gittiğin mühim değildir çünkü burada ölüm, her köşede pusuda bekler."
languages.original_text: "There are no other cities, elantach. The Dark City has no bounds, it is a tangle of countless nightmare domains subject to a single ruler. An endless amalgamation of ever-changing and immutable dimensions. You cannot grasp its tenebrous grandeur, for even my life will not be long enough to visit all corners of the Dark City and the realms that border it. But it hardly matters where you go, for death lurks on every corner."

traits.locale_text: "Onun dışında bir şehir yok elantach. Kara Şehir'in hududu yoktur. Tek bir hükümdara tabi olan, iç içe geçmiş nice kâbus diyarından oluşur. Sürekli değişen ve asla değişmeyen boyutların ebediyen bütünleşmesidir. Kasvetli ihtişamını tam anlamıyla kavraman mümkün değildir. Benim ömrüm bile Kara Şehir'in dört bir yanını ve hudut komşusu diyarları ziyaret etmeye yetmeyecek. Yine de nereye gittiğin mühim değildir çünkü ölüm her köşede pusuda bekler."
